a.title: tutor.com is available at Knob Noster!

img.alt: tutor.com is available at Knob Noster!

p.span:
Proudly serving the Knob Noster and Whiteman Air Force Base community, Knob Noster Public Schools is the region's premier and top-performing school district! With a multitude of local, state, and national awards and recognitions, Knob Noster Public Schools continues to provide opportunities for students to stand apart from the rest.
If you are looking for a high-quality public school, look no further. With two out of three Knob Noster students being military-connected, our teachers and students not only understand the unique dynamics of military life, but we also embrace it as a way to make our school, our community, and our students stronger.
Knob Noster Public Schools encompasses an early childhood program, two elementary schools, one middle school and one high school. Currently, the district enrolls approximately 1,600 students in grades kindergarten through twelve.
As you relocate to the Whiteman Air Force Base Region, make the choice that makes a difference - choose Knob Noster Public Schools for your child's education. Come experience the place where orange and black meets red, white, and blue!
Knob Noster Public Schools is honored to be the recipient of the Partnership of Excellence Award through the Military Child Education Coalition in 2017 and 2019.

401 East Wimer Street
Knob Noster, MO 65336
(660) 563-3186
(660) 563-3026 fax
